Package tk.airshipcraft.commonlib.gui

package tk.airshipcraft.commonlib.gui
The GUI package provides a comprehensive set of classes for creating and managing graphical user interfaces within the Minecraft server. This includes event handling for GUI interactions, and implementation classes for various GUI components like scoreboards (Sidebar), action bars (Bossbar), and player-specific displays (BelowName).

Subpackages:

  • events - Contains classes for GUI event handling.
  • objects - Contains classes for GUI components and their implementations.

Key classes:

  • Gui - Base class for creating custom GUIs.
  • GuiBuilder - Aids in building complex GUIs with a fluent interface.
  • GuiManager - Manages the lifecycle and interactions of all GUI instances.

Use this package as a foundation for building interactive and dynamic interfaces for server plugins, providing a seamless experience for players.

Since:
2023-11-20
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
notzune

    Class
    Description
    Gui
    Abstract class for creating GUIs (Graphical User Interfaces) in Minecraft.
    GuiBuilder
    A class to build and manage GUIs (Graphical User Interfaces) in Minecraft.
    GuiManager
    Manages GUI interactions and dispatches events to the corresponding GUIs.
